website_summaries.verdict: This high-quality product is a fan favorite for its supreme comfort and enduring warmth.
pros: Made of high-quality neoprene for excellent heat preservation
Comes in either blue or pink
Stitching purposely made to reduce seam irritation
Flexible nylon used in sleeves and underarms
cons: Some buyers complained of the jacket being disproportional

customer_reviews.title: Odd sizing
customer_reviews.text: Sizing on this is odd, I wear a medium or a large in most everything but ordered this in large and it was way too big as a wetsuit jacket, then ordered medium and while it fit right in some areas, it was still too big in other areas, and the sleeves seem disproportionally long. I returned both and switched to another brand, really wanted a jacket with pink in it, but this was the only one with pink and the sizing was just not proportioned correctly which is important when using it the cold waters of lake michigan.
customer_reviews.author: bluetn

customer_reviews.title: Great wet suit jacket
customer_reviews.text: Great wet suit jacket. Nice thick Neoprene that keeps me warm while water jogging in our pool after the weather has turned colder. If you're considering a wetsuit, I highly recommend getting 2 pieces instead of a jump suit. There are lots of times when I get too hot and have to take the jacket off and just wear the pants... Can't do that with a one piece. The jacket appears to be very good quality and has been laundered once on the hand wash cycle of my front loader and hung to dry inside with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie C.

customer_reviews.title: which if it is the right size it would be fantastic. So I'm buying a large and we'll see ...
customer_reviews.text: I look at reviews and ordered a size up which was a mistake! I'm 5'4 180. And I bought an XL. It's too big in the neck, wrists, upper chest and waist. It is also longer, which if it is the right size it would be fantastic. So I'm buying a large and we'll see how that goes
customer_reviews.author: Mikaela

customer_reviews.title: This for me was more like a XL size but it was good as that ...
customer_reviews.text: I just receive the jacket and want to help someone on sizing. I ordered the 2XL and it fit but it was not as 2XL compared to clothing for men at the stores here. I am 6' and weight 200 lbs and so no big belly. This for me was more like a XL size but it was good as that is what I wear in T-Shirts to feel comfortable and not tight. So the 2XL was good for me but if they had a 3XL I might of gotten that and it would of still fit me. The XL would of been too small.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Prefer this over a full 3mm wet suit
customer_reviews.text: Love this Layatone Wetsuit top. 3mm neoprene on body not arms. The jacket really is a 3 mm vest with long sleeve rash guard; this was perfect for scuba diving in Jamaica over bathing suit, the Sea of Cortez and Great Barrier Reef (I did wear this jacket over a short sleveve rash guard for a bit more warmth on night dives. My arms were protected from the few jelly fish encounters and not having the full 3mm neoprene on the sleeves made swimming and picture taking a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Fay

customer_reviews.title: It does have some room and is not really tight like a wet suit
customer_reviews.text: Typically, I go for a a bit larger size when unable to try things on since I do have wider shoulders and am a 38 c and wear a 12-14 in women's shirts. I purchased a large. It does have some room and is not really tight like a wet suit. If your looking for a a tighter, sung fit, I would recommend the medium, otherwise the large works well.
customer_reviews.author: hsmith

customer_reviews.title: Made well but, not full bodice neoprine means cold sides
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a large according to the size chart and the fit is loose in the waist, right in the arms, too small around hips and bust. This makes it flip up during activities and I end up having to tuck it into my pants. Also... The description when I purchased mentioned neoprene body 3mil and lycra sleeves. Note that only the front and back panels are neoprene. The sleeves and SIDES are lycra. So, while my back and front are warm, my SIDES are cold! :-(
customer_reviews.author: dp

customer_reviews.title: Allows me to participate in outside Water Aerobics in 55 degree weather (in heated pool)
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this. Florida can get cold (55 or so at 8:30 am when we begin) in the "winter". This jacket allows me to participate in outside water aerobics in a heated pool where my chest down is in heated water, but my shoulders above are out of the water. When this one wears out, I will absolutely buy another. I have even worn it in an inside pool where the air temperature is very cool and/ or the lap pool is cool.Because the sleeves are rash guard, it is very comfortable to exercise in.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Sloat

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: I ended up buying 2 of these wetsuit tops. One of each type of sleeve. I double them up and they are great. They fit true to size and luckily I can make them fit on top of each other. I just wish they had a way to attach to the pant. They did ride up a while in the water. I used these for scuba diving and going to probably where the lycra ( thin sleeve) for snorkeling. I would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Hopps

customer_reviews.title: ill fitted around collarbone
customer_reviews.text: I loved the pattern of this wetsuit so was hugely disappointed with the fit. Im small and petite but quite 'breasty'. I had read reviews about it being lose in shoulder chest area but thought maybe it would work as i could 'fill it'. The design is really off. It was really baggy around the 'pec' area and neck. I ordered a small too.
customer_reviews.author: Ixcheal Cook

customer_reviews.title: wetsuit jacket
customer_reviews.text: The top I received fits well. I read the previous comments and ordered a medium instead of the large. I have muscular shoulders and upper back due to a lifetime of water sports and this jacket fits. I like the heavier material in the body with more flexible arms. The design stands out enough to recognize but isn't too flash.
customer_reviews.author: Devadiva

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Well made.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great jacket! Sizing chart is accurate. It's a very comfortable fit. It is water proof. Fast delivery. I am so satisfied with this product that I went ahead and ordered another one for my husband. We use them for the WaveRunner in April and May when the water is still cold.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Heady

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable - Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: I don't write reviews, but I was very impressed with this that I had to share. This is very comfortable and is a great fit. Don't worry if you need to snug the waist line a bit because there is a draw string. I won't need it but its there. Most Neoprene suits are somewhat uncomfortable because they try to make you conform to their stiff nature. Since the shoulders, arms and sides are lycra there isn't an unnatural pulling around the shoulders and underarms. I will be able to use this for cold days to bike, do rowing, or swimming. If there was another pattern I would buy a second one. It very nice
customer_reviews.author: david stacy

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable but runs small
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a paddle board trip. It was perfect for that use. It kept me warm but the lycra sleeves did not allow me to overheat. It dried quickly after getting wet. I used the size measurements to purchase my first jacket and I could not even close the zipper. I returned that one and got a bigger size. That one was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Shoulder sizing odd
customer_reviews.text: Really nice jacket, except there is soo much bulk in the shoulder area. Very nice looking and other than the shoulder area, fit is good. LOVE the partial lycra in the sleeve. I have purchased a smaller size, hoping the shoulder area will be a more snug fit, we will see. I suspect they women men in the description is better for men. They need to look at the shoulder area and make it clearer if this is for women or men.
customer_reviews.author: Livs

customer_reviews.title: Cute but sleeves are nylon not neoprene.
customer_reviews.text: I thought the sleeves were also neoprene, they are nylon cloth. This will be perfect for snorkeling in pacific, but not on a chilly day on the lake.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Neil

customer_reviews.title: Liked it, but waaaay to big
customer_reviews.text: I never got the chance to use it in the water, so I can't attest to that aspect. Zipper was durable and easy to use, liked the design, but I am 5'4, 135 lbs, and a small was absolutely huge on me. I would have ordered an extra small after returning it, but they don't make an extra small. So I went with a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good for women, not men
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, but sleeves and length short. This is more for a woman, not a tall man. Has Africa animals on sleeves. Can't tell print from these pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you warm, rashguard arms make it easier to put in and off.
customer_reviews.text: This keeps you warm in the pool. I've had a month and it has faded to brown, and stretched out a tad. Some of the jackets have a tab where you can make tighter, mine didn't come with this. I was wondering how to find out about this as I may order another and tab would be great as it curls up now since it's stretched out a bit.
customer_reviews.author: andrea altavilla

customer_reviews.title: Great Jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the women’s neoprene jacket with pink sleeves. Well made and attractive, also fits well. Seller takes pride in their product. Jacket needs to fit snugly when dry to keep you warm in cool water. Size charts are accurate!
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: Fitted for Men
customer_reviews.text: The shoulders are too broad for women. Leaves lots of space for water to get in which means you will not get the snug warm fit you are looking for. I would say not unisex, just for men
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Runs large.  Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: I'm normally a size 8 - I bought the small and it is very baggy on me - so will not work like a wetsuit should. I still wear it like a jacket, and I like it. Quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Suspence

customer_reviews.title: Better for Men
customer_reviews.text: I am a woman and tried this on and it was too big in the chest area. I had my husband try it on and it fit him perfectly through the chest. So I recommend the Natyfly or Lemoricin wetsuit jacket for women. This is great for men's physique.
customer_reviews.author: CSS

customer_reviews.title: 65 degrees in fl + unheated pool + this jacket = Love IT!
customer_reviews.text: 65 degrees in fl + unheated pool + this jacket = Love IT! Im 42DD 5'9 got the XL - perfect
customer_reviews.author: violetlavender

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit well
customer_reviews.text: Runs way to big in the chest, sleeve don’t really fit so water gets in and chest bunches up defeating the whole point of the purchase
customer_reviews.author: lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I recently used this in my recent trip to Hawaii and in 78-79 degree water. It worked excellent. I’m very happy with this purchase. The jacket kept me warm even during a night dive.
customer_reviews.author: chuy jay

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I use this for sailing myHobie sailboat. They are comfortable, fits nicely over a rash guard and keeps me comfortable without being constrained, just what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Steve L

customer_reviews.title: Good product and great fit.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit and easy to get on and off. Was disappointed it did not give me the extra warmth I was looking for .
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: Looked like a fine product, but runs large.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the small, but even that was huge. I teach swim lessons and water aerobics, and so get new jackets about once every 6 months. This is the only brand I have gotten that runs large and was too big even though I purchased the smallest size.
customer_reviews.author: marlee figueroa

customer_reviews.title: Not a wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT a wetsuit! This is a rash guard. Buyers beware!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: ur. Wzrm in the pool
customer_reviews.text: Great swim jacket. I wear it in outside pool.wt. 158. ht 5ft 4. Medium us tight ...u may need help to zipper it up. I happy with ut.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: good for value
customer_reviews.text: I take aqua aerobics and it is in an outdoor heated pool so in the winter its cold. being in the water is fine, but with a lot of exercises you need the cover for chest and back. helps a little with arms.
customer_reviews.author: mjt

customer_reviews.title: Liked another one better for fit
customer_reviews.text: Tried 3 different models. Liked another one better for fit. This one the sleeves slid down my arm to my elbows. My waist and hip are almost the same size, so the extra inch just flapped in the water. A smaller size would have been too tight in the chest.
customer_reviews.author: Tesla owner since 2012

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: Ordered my normal size and it fits perfect except the arms are a tad long. I don’t mind that though
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Great top
customer_reviews.text: I am part of a group that exercises in the ocean three times a week and this is a great top when it gets cooler!
customer_reviews.author: Christine A. Kube

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed because it’s so cute and was affordable but not ...
customer_reviews.text: Be aware that everywhere the design is, is VERY thin. Rash guard thin. The ONLY wet suit warmth is from the black material. Disappointed because it’s so cute and was affordable but not warm and that’s the reason I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful fit for water Zumba.
customer_reviews.text: Allows for free movement of arms. Elastic cord keeps hem at the hips. Very pretty too.
customer_reviews.author: Holly H.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my wife. It looked great and she used it instead of swimsuit for weeks. Still looks great
customer_reviews.author: Sasan Khashaei

customer_reviews.title: Go xl size if you are a bit out of shape.
customer_reviews.text: Definately keeps you warm. If your male and not 100% fit then get an extra large to fit the waist and belly.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: I love the lightweight sleeves
customer_reviews.text: I love the lightweight sleeves. I use it for water aerobics and it let's me move very easily. It is snug, but that is what you want so that it doesn't ride up when you are in the water.
customer_reviews.author: SoCal Mom

customer_reviews.title: Layatone Jacket
customer_reviews.text: The Layatone jacket was a perfect fit. I love the comfort and feel of the jacket when in the water and it keeps me very warm. I play water volleyball 5 days a week and comfort and ability to move in it is great. I would recommend this product for all active water sports. Also the service time and guarantee is GREAT. THANKS B. B. The Villages, Florida
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Buck

customer_reviews.title: Kept me warm snorkeling
customer_reviews.text: Very cute tropical color. Easy to get off when wet. Kept me warm so I could go into the ocean easily without inching in.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the jacket for scuba diving in tropical Florida/Caribbean water and it was perfect!!. The fit and performance was great. I have only positive feed back for this item so much that in the future I will purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Mason

customer_reviews.title: Great Jacket and great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket at great value and just bought a 2nd one for the boat. Does fit small, so go up at least 1 size!
customer_reviews.author: Fitnik

customer_reviews.title: Love this wetsuit jacket
customer_reviews.text: Love this wetsuit jacket. Love the lightweight sleeves. Most wetsuits are so heavy and hot. So please with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: debra allen

customer_reviews.title: A great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this jacket for water aerobics classes outside. The fit for me was perfect. It was delivered promptly and is a great quality.
customer_reviews.author: PAR 16

customer_reviews.title: This is a great wetsuit jacket
customer_reviews.text: This is a great wetsuit jacket. Love the sleeves as they give you nice range of motion and flex while paddling. I went with my true size which is a small and I am 5'5" and 125 lbs and it fits perfect. Not too tight either and I wore a thin shirt under it too.
customer_reviews.author: J.B.

customer_reviews.title: sleeves fit but body loose
customer_reviews.text: like material. body has a lot of extra sace. Wll still need to wear another shirt under to take up the room
customer_reviews.author: Amy Hill

customer_reviews.title: Was not what I expected, didn't like the style
customer_reviews.text: Material was too heavy for what I needed it for, I had hoped I could wear it doing aqua fit classes, but it wasn't quite what I had expected.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Wells

customer_reviews.title: Just didn't like it. Wanted collar to be higher
customer_reviews.text: Just didn't like it. Wanted collar to be higher. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: MountainCowboy

customer_reviews.title: was a great fit but the arms are definitely not neoprene and ...
customer_reviews.text: was a great fit but the arms are definitely not neoprene and the smell of the jacket was so toxic I gagged when I opened the bag
customer_reviews.author: KMM

customer_reviews.title: Sleeve difference
customer_reviews.text: I purchaed this jacket 2 years ago and attempted to repurchase it - with the thought that it was the same jacket. However when I received the jacket - the sleeves were different. I was very unhappy with the purchse. The marketing for this jacket should be two seperate order numbers not one with sleeve differences.
customer_reviews.author: susie tomlin (work)

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit. Perfect transaction
customer_reviews.text: Cant' wait to use this!!! the afternoon sun was warm enough to just wear a swim suit. I'll need it soon though! Perfect fit. Perfect transaction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my core warm.
customer_reviews.text: I use this wetsuit jacket to play outdoor watervolleyball. I use it on days the air temperature is 65 or lower. The water temperature is a consistent 82. The suit fits tight and keeps me warm. Very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Ferlito

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid buying without trying on, but it fits perfectly. Good quality. I will have good protection diving in Cozumel
customer_reviews.author: Ales Bose

customer_reviews.title: Haven't used it yet but it appears to be well made
customer_reviews.text: The fit is good although it is just a bit short in the waist and may ride up a little bit under water water. Have to wait and see.
customer_reviews.author: fchamp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love the jacket. Glad I ordered the large based on reviews, usually wear an xl
customer_reviews.author: mstwink

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you warm
customer_reviews.text: It kept me warm but was cut a little big
customer_reviews.author: cathy moylan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect can’t believe it. I’m 5’7. 185. I bought 2xl.
customer_reviews.author: BARBARA

customer_reviews.title: but I am pretty tall, 5
customer_reviews.text: Only reason I gave it 4 stars is it's a little short for me, but I am pretty tall, 5.9.
customer_reviews.author: Svetlana

customer_reviews.title: Water jacket
customer_reviews.text: I love it it keeps me warm but the sleeves are great I do water workouts I’m going to get another one
customer_reviews.author: sandy

customer_reviews.title: Easiest sale I ever had.
customer_reviews.text: Like the fit and color scheme! It looks great on me!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marty & Ruth Reardon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for price - keeps me warm - sized no is a little larger than expected
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect on cool days for my exercise class in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Kadunn

customer_reviews.title: Sleeves are not neoprene
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like at all the fact that the sleeves are *not* neoprene. The arms feel cold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Women’s size chart is way off.
customer_reviews.text: The sizing chart for women is way off. It directs you to but 2-3 sizes bigger than you need.
customer_reviews.author: Zwaard

customer_reviews.title: Great for Chilly Swims
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket for SUP or the beach on chilly wave days
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for Aquafit
customer_reviews.text: Keeps me warm in the pool for Aqua exercise. It does ride up with activity but still great.
customer_reviews.author: CALVIN D. BRENNEMAN

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: The fit and comfort are important while doing water aerobics. It is nice looking as well
customer_reviews.author: Ginny Y

customer_reviews.title: Swim Even in Freezing Winter!
customer_reviews.text: I can finally swim in our freezing pool during winter months....and I'm in Puerto Aventuras, México.....Great, ingenious product
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Galat

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Definitely helps keep you warm in the pool. Does fade.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Good shirt, but it's way too big. Order a size smaller.
customer_reviews.text: According to the size chart I'm a size small, but this shirt is way too big for me. If your in between sizes definitely order a size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a musical routine with my dog to the Jaws theme! Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it's perfect. Thank
customer_reviews.text: Cute. Just as advertised. Fit runs big...so I ordered one size down...it's perfect. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Carol D.

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: kept me warm as i did a polar plunge in 37 degree water!
customer_reviews.author: A. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Odd size
customer_reviews.text: The shoulders and arms are too big. I bought it because it's for men and women, but I think it's for men.
customer_reviews.author: Jiae Lee

customer_reviews.title: Keeping warm
customer_reviews.text: This time of the year the pool is cold but with this PEFECT.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Coats

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn’t wear well. After using it 2 months the chlorine ate holes in the arms.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Reed

customer_reviews.title: Most pleased
customer_reviews.text: The order came when it was expected, and the top is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny Cox

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well for warmth keeps your body warm arms allow water to flow through
customer_reviews.author: WOUNDY

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not really a 2X but due to sleeve design able to wear.
customer_reviews.author: BELINDA D.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. But runs a little big. Might order an extra small
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket ..can easily take off when over warm when sup
customer_reviews.author: Alan Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, super warm and much more comfortable than a onesie wet suit
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Whimpey

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my purchase. Good quality and the fit is as expected. I also appreciate the fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice. It is very 'roomy' around the shoulder area ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice. It is very 'roomy' around the shoulder area is my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Suzi E

customer_reviews.title: Worked great, just the right amount of protection for these ...
customer_reviews.text: Just used these to dive in French Polynesia and Cook Islands. Worked great, just the right amount of protection for these waters in winter. As advertised the arms are not insulated but allow for great freedom of movement. I step up from just a dive skin with a bit more warmth and protection in the torso.
customer_reviews.author: G. Smoluk

customer_reviews.title: Really Great Choice
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 16 top and this top fit perfectly. It does retain the heat your body generates swimming. Very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: sun&wind

customer_reviews.title: Order 4-5 sizes larger than you need and be sure ...
customer_reviews.text: Order 4-5 sizes larger than you need and be sure to air this out for a week or more to let the stench of the material go away.
customer_reviews.author: RRS

product_meta.title: LayaTone Wetsuits Top Women Men 3mm Neoprene Jacket Scuba Diving Surfing Suit Top Rash Guard Long Sleeevs Front YKK Zipper Wet Suits Jacket Adults
feature_bullets: One is the sleeve, the underarm and the side waist are made of nylon, and the front and back body parts are made of 3mm neoprene. One is a wetsuit top made of 3mm neoprene.

White thread eight-needle stitching to reduce seam irritation,Bright blue 3D ink jet printing,unique and beautiful.Elastic, Wear-resistant,Quick-Drying,UV resistant,Keep Warm,YKK Zipper,3D Inkjet Printing Pattern
Strengthened YKK front zipper is designed to allows for easy entry and exit.

The designed to keep your warm in the cold conditions for Scuba Diving, Spearfishing,Surfing, Swimming, Snorkeling, Boating, Canoeing, Kayaking,Sailing,Running,Fitness,Hiking, Free Diving and other Water Sports.
PLEASE NOTE: Different versions have different sizes,please choose the best size after measuring your Chest/Waist and other data.
